0.3 (2010-03-17)
================

- Added support for Chameleon expressions using the ``expressions`` option in
  buildout.cfg or the ``--expression`` command line argument.

- Bug fix: now the po template file is correctly encoded in UTF-8.

- Bug fix: element's tail should not be included in the msg id.

- Bug fix: added support for translated elements contained in other translated
  elements and marked with i18n:name.

0.2 (2010-03-02)
================

- Added a new helper script to recompile the po files.

0.1 (2010-02-17)
================

- First public release.
